name: enlarged
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
enlarge
[ I or T ] to become bigger or to make something bigger: They've enlarged the kitchen by building over part of the garden. an enlarged spleen
[ T ] to print a bigger copy of a photograph or document
